alert.note: Alert for Allen; Greenwood; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:18PM CST until January 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Greenwood, Woodson and Allen Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the early morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on Highway 54 will be affected by the snow, blowing snow and occasional strong cross-winds, making travel difficult and hazardous tonight. Slippery conditions can also be expected on Highways 75 and 169 during this time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
